title: Rolling Loud California 2025 YouTube Livestream Schedule & Details Announced
description: Find out when to catch Playboi Carti, A$AP Rocky, Sexyy Red, Peso Pluma, and more
author: Walden Green
excerpt: Find out when to catch Playboi Carti, A$AP Rocky, Sexyy Red, Peso Pluma, and more
text: The latest California edition of Rolling Loud takes place on Saturday, March 15, and Sunday, March 16, at Inglewood’s Hollywood Park Grounds. All the performances across three stages will be broadcast on YouTube. The first Saturday performance begins at 4:45 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time, and the first Sunday performance starts at 3:45 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time. The GoPuff Stage—where all three headliners will perform—is also set to stream on Twitch and TikTok.Rolling Loud California is headlined by Playboi Carti (who will be playing music from his just-released new album, Music), A$AP Rocky, and Peso Pluma, the latter of whom is the first non-hip-hop headliner in the festival’s history. Other performers include Cash Cobain, Sexyy Red, Lazer Dim 700, OsamaSon, Skaiwater, Ken Carson, and Nettspend. Find the schedule for Rolling Loud California 2025 below.Yesterday (March 14), Playboi Carti finally released Music, his long-delayed follow-up to 2020’s Whole Lotta Red. Read Pitchfork’s new breakdown of the album, “5 Takeaways From Playboi Carti’s New Album Music.”Rolling Loud California 2025 Schedule(All times listed in Eastern Daylight Time)* schedule is subject to changeSaturday, March 15, 20254:45 PM - Hoosh4:50 PM - Chow Lee4:55 PM - DJ Five Venoms5:10 PM - Miles Minnick5:15 PM - Peysoh5:30 PM - Ray Emmanuel5:40 PM - Joeyy6:15 PM - DDG6:15 PM - Jordan Adetunji6:30 PM - BabyChiefDoIt6:50 PM - 310Babii7:20 PM - Real Boston Richey7:25 PM - Larry June7:30 PM - DJ Scheme & Friends8:00 PM - Cash Cobain8:00 PM - Gelo8:10 PM - 1900Rugrat8:25 PM - Ski Mask the Slump God8:40 PM - Dave Blunts8:45 PM - Ab-Soul9:10 PM - Hotboii9:20 PM - Sexyy Red9:35 PM - Ian9:40 PM - King Lil G10:10 PM - Xavier Wulf x Eddy Baker10:30 PM - Peso Pluma10:35 PM - Bossman Dlow10:50 PM - Glokk40Spaz11:25 PM - Lazer Dim 70011:45 PM - YG12:00 AM - OsamaSon12:30 AM - A$AP RockySunday, March 16, 20253:45 PM - Bad Neighbors3:45 PM - Yo Trane4:00 PM - DJ Five Venoms4:05 PM - DrownMili4:15 PM - Clip4:30 PM - Sid Shyne4:45 PM - Stunna Girl4:55 PM - UntilJapan5:15 PM - Redveil5:20 PM - ThxSoMuch5:20 PM - Hurricane Wisdom5:45 PM - AZ Chike5:45 PM - DrexTheJoint6:00 PM - Sematary6:15 PM - EBK Jaaybo6:15 PM - Kamaiyah6:40 PM - Luh Tyler6:45 PM - DC the Don6:55 PM - 03 Greedo7:15 PM - La Santa Grifa7:15 PM - Loe Shimmy7:35 PM - Homixide Gang7:45 PM - F1lthy7:50 PM - Tee Grizzley8:15 PM - Skaiwater8:30 PM - Destroy Lonely8:35 PM - Dom Kennedy8:45 PM - Lefty Gunplay9:15 PM - Che9:35 PM - Surprise Guest9:45 PM - Ken Carson9:50 PM - Devour10:25 PM - Molly Santana10:45 PM - Blxst11:00 PM - Nettspend11:30 PM - Playboi Carti
html:
The latest California edition of Rolling Loud takes place on Saturday, March 15, and Sunday, March 16, at Inglewood’s Hollywood Park Grounds. All the performances across three stages will be broadcast on YouTube. The first Saturday performance begins at 4:45 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time, and the first Sunday performance starts at 3:45 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time. The GoPuff Stage—where all three headliners will perform—is also set to stream on Twitch and TikTok.

Rolling Loud California is headlined by Playboi Carti (who will be playing music from his just-released new album, Music), A$AP Rocky, and Peso Pluma, the latter of whom is the first non-hip-hop headliner in the festival’s history. Other performers include Cash Cobain, Sexyy Red, Lazer Dim 700, OsamaSon, Skaiwater, Ken Carson, and Nettspend. Find the schedule for Rolling Loud California 2025 below.

Yesterday (March 14), Playboi Carti finally released Music, his long-delayed follow-up to 2020’s Whole Lotta Red. Read Pitchfork’s new breakdown of the album, “5 Takeaways From Playboi Carti’s New Album Music.”

(All times listed in Eastern Daylight Time)

* schedule is subject to change
